name: additionalClaim
surveyDefinition:
{ "pages": [ { "name": "Subsequent Employment", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "subsequentEmployment", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Have you worked since <>? ", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] } ], "title": "Subsequent Employment", "category": "Subsequent Employment" }, { "name": "Union", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "unionHiringHall", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "helpText": "An employment office operated by a union for placing members in jobs.", "title": "Do you receive work through a union hiring hall?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "unionStanding", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Are you a member in good standing?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "text", "name": "unionName", "tag": "Optimum SingleLine", "title": "Please enter your union name", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "text", "name": "unionLocalNumber", "tag": "Optimum Number", "title": "Please enter your union local number", "isRequired": true } ], "name": "panel6", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{unionStanding}='Yes'" } ], "name": "panel5", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{unionHiringHall}='Yes'" } ], "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{subsequentEmployment} = 'Yes'", "title": "Union", "category": "Employment Info" }, { "name": "Military", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "militaryServiceOnActiveDuty", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Were you a member of the U.S. military on active duty at any time since <>?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "dropdown", "name": "militaryServiceStatePhysicalLocation", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryServiceOnActiveDuty} = 'Yes'", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": "Was your most recent employment with the U.S. military? ", "isRequired": true, "choiceUrl": "optimum-clientside-library/platform-services/dist/data/statesList.json" }, { "type": "html", "name": "militaryServiceOnActiveDuty Msg", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryServiceStatePhysicalLocation} notempty and {militaryServiceStatePhysicalLocation} != 'IA'", "html": "When filing a military unemployment claim, federal law requires you to be physically present in the state in which you are filing. You must file the application in the state where you are currently located. " }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "html", "name": "question1", "html": "Additional information is needed to complete your claim. Use your Certificate of Release or Discharge from Active Duty DD214 to answer the following questions then upload your Member 4 copy of the DD214." }, { "type": "text", "name": "militaryServiceBranchOfService", "tag": "Optimum SingleLine", "title": "What was your Branch of Service? (Item 2)", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "text", "name": "militaryServiceLastPayGrade", "tag": "Optimum SingleLine", "title": "What was your last pay grade? (Item 4b)", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "multipletext", "name": "militaryService", "tag": "Optimum StartEndDatepicker", "isLimitToCurrentDate": true, "startDateName": "What was your Entry Date? (Item 12a)", "endDateName": "What was your Separation Date? (Item 12b)", "title": "Please enter your entry date and separation date", "isRequired": true, "titleLocation": "hidden", "items": [ { "name": "startDate" }, { "name": "endDate" } ] }, { "type": "html", "name": "militaryServiceCantSubmitMsg", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "compareDate(getEndDate({militaryService}), computeBYB()) = 1", "dynamicTitle": "If you submit this application today, the start date of your UI claim is Sunday, <>. Federal law does not allow a Military UI claim to start before the separation date listed on the DD214. You must wait to submit your claim application until Sunday, <>. \n", "html": "If you submit this application today, the start date of your UI claim is Sunday, <>. Federal law does not allow a Military UI claim to start before the separation date listed on the DD214. You must wait to submit your claim application until Sunday, <>. \n" }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "text", "name": "militaryServiceDaysOfAccruedLeave", "tag": "Optimum Number", "title": "Please enter the number of days of accrued leave as it appears in item 16 on Form DD214", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "dropdown", "name": "militaryServiceCharacter", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": "What was the Character of Service? (Item 24)", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Honorable", "Dishonorable", "General", "Other Than Honorable", "Uncharacterized", "Bad Conduct" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "militaryServiceDatesOfTimeLost", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Are there any dates of time lost listed in item #29 on your DD214?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "text", "name": "militaryServiceTimeLostDatesLabel", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryServiceDatesOfTimeLost} = 'Yes'", "tag": "Optimum Label", "title": "Please enter the Start Date and End Date of time lost in item #29 on your DD214.", "placeHolder": "THIS IS NOT A QUESTION" }, { "type": "multipletext", "name": "militaryServiceTimeLostDates", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryServiceDatesOfTimeLost} = 'Yes'", "tag": "Optimum StartEndDatepicker", "isLimitToCurrentDate": true, "startDateName": "Start Date", "endDateName": "End Date", "title": "Please enter the Start Date and End Date of time lost in item #29 on your DD214.", "isRequired": true, "titleLocation": "hidden" }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "militaryServiceOtherEmployment", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryServiceDatesOfTimeLost} = 'No'", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "dynamicTitle": "Have you had any other employment since your military service ended on getEndDate({militaryService})?", "title": "Have you had any other employment since your military service ended on getEndDate({militaryService})?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "text", "name": "militaryServiceJobTitle", "tag": "Optimum JobSearch", "title": "What was your job title?", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "text", "name": "militaryServiceJobDuties", "tag": "Optimum SingleLine", "title": "What were your job duties?", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "html", "name": "militaryNoWagesMsg", "html": "Wages you earned from the military will not be listed on your first monetary record because these wages must be requested. Once we receive your wages, we will send you a corrected monetary record. \n" } ], "name": "panel10", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryServiceOtherEmployment} ='No'" } ], "name": "panel9", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "(compareDate(getEndDate({militaryService}), computeBYB()) < 0) or (compareDate(getEndDate({militaryService}), computeBYB()) = 0)" } ], "name": "panel8", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryServiceStatePhysicalLocation} = 'IA'" } ], "name": "panel7", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryServiceOnActiveDuty} = 'Yes'" } ], "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{subsequentEmployment} = 'Yes'", "title": "Military", "category": "Employment Info", "blockIf": "({militaryServiceStatePhysicalLocation} notempty and {militaryServiceStatePhysicalLocation} != 'IA') or (compareDate(getEndDate({militaryService}), \"<>\") = 1)" }, { "name": "Federal Civilian", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "federalWorkConfirmation", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Was your most recent employment with the Federal Government as a civilian employee?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "text", "name": "federalEmployerName", "tag": "Optimum SingleLine", "title": "What was the name of your Federal Employer?", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "text", "name": "federalAgencyDepartment", "tag": "Optimum SingleLine", "title": "In which department within the Federal Agency did you work?", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "dropdown", "name": "federalLastOfficialDutyStation", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{federalWorkConfirmation}='Yes'", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": "What was your Last Office Duty Station?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "item1", "item2", "item3" ], "choiceUrl": "optimum-clientside-library/platform-services/dist/data/statesList.json" }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "multipletext", "name": "federalPayrollAddress", "tag": "Optimum Address", "title": "What is the payroll address from your SF8 or SF50 form?", "isRequired": true, "items": [ { "name": "addressLine1" }, { "name": "addressLine2" }, { "name": "city" }, { "name": "state" }, { "name": "zip" }, { "name": "zipExtension" } ] }, { "type": "multipletext", "name": "federalEmploymentDates", "tag": "Optimum StartEndDatepicker", "isLimitToCurrentDate": true, "startDateName": "First date worked", "endDateName": "Last date worked", "title": "What were your dates of employment?", "isRequired": true, "titleLocation": "hidden" }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "text", "name": "federalOtherEmploymentJobTitle", "tag": "Optimum JobSearch", "title": "What was your job title?", "isRequired": true }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "federalOtherEmploymentWasFT", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Was this full-time employment?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "dropdown", "name": "federalReasonSeparation", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "helpText": "Reason for Separation
  • I quit - You decided to leave employment for any reason except mandatory retirement, or for service in the armed forces.
", "title": "What was your reason for separation?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "I quit", "I was terminated", "I was laid off", { "value": "I'm still employed", "text": "Im still employed" }, "I left for military service or training", { "value": "I'm off work due to a labor dispute/strike/lockout", "text": "Im off work due to a labor dispute/strike/lockout" }, { "value": "I'm off work due to a natural disaster", "text": "Im off work due to a natural disaster" }, "The business I worked for closed permanently" ] }, { "type": "dropdown", "name": "federalReasonTermination", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{federalReasonSeparation}='I was terminated'", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "helpText": "Reason for Termination
  • Reduction in force or company downsizing - Your employer ended your employment due to lack of funds, lack of work, redesign or elimination of position(s) or reorganization, with no likelihood or expectation that the employee will be recalled because the position itself is eliminated.
  • Alleged misconduct - Your employer ended your employment due to a disregard for the employer’s policies or standards.
  • Forced Resignation - Your employer ended your employment by requiring you to quit. A forced resignation is often offered instead of termination.
", "title": "What was the reason for your termination?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Reduction in force or company downsizing", "No reason given to me by my employer", "Temporary assignment ended/Employer had no more work available", "Work performance/Not meeting company goals", "Attendance", "Medical reasons", "Alleged misconduct ", "Alleged theft ", "Work rule violation ", "Forced Resignation ", "Other" ] }, { "type": "dropdown", "name": "federalReasonLaidOff", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{federalReasonSeparation}='I was laid off'", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": "Please select one of the following:", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "I am permanently laid off ", "I am temporarily laid off ", "My temporary job assignment ended " ] }, { "type": "dropdown", "name": "federalReasonStillEmployed", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{federalReasonSeparation}='Im still employed'", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": "Please select one of the following:", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "I requested a reduction in hours ", "Employer has permanently reduced my hours ", "Employer has temporarily reduced my hours ", "I am currently on a leave of absence ", "There has been no change to my hours with this employer " ] }, { "type": "panel", "elements": [ { "type": "dropdown", "name": "federalReasonClosedPermanently", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": \n
    \n
  • The statements and information I have provided on this application will be used to determine my eligibility for UI benefits and are subject to verification.
    • \n
  • I may be guilty of fraud if I make false statements, provide false information, or knowingly withhold information to receive benefits.
    • \n
  • If I commit UI fraud, I may be fined, penalized, and criminally prosecuted.
    • \n
  • The information I provide to Iowa Workforce Development (IWD) may be made available to federal, state or local agencies and their subcontractors who administer employment and training programs.
    • \n
  • I must repay any UI benefits paid to me that I am not eligible to receive.
    • \n
  • I must file a weekly claim to request a benefit payment.
    • \n
  • I must report any income earned while I am filing to collect UI benefits.
    • \n
  • I must report any issues that might affect my ability to work or availability for work.
    • \n
  • I must report any separation that happens while I am filing to collect UI benefits.
    • \n
  • I must report if I refuse a job offer or referral.
    • \n
  • I must report any issues that limit my availability to work or attend training.
    • \n
  • I am required to know my rights and responsibilities while claiming UI benefits.
    • \n
  • I am required to contact the UI customer service if I have questions about my responsibilities or requirements of receiving UI benefits.
    • \n
    \t\nI certify:\n
      \n
    • I will read the Unemployment Insurance Handbook.
      • \n
    • I am totally or partially unemployed.
      • \n
    • I am able to work or attend training.
      • \n
    • I am registered for work by filing this application.
      • \n
    • Statements I have made on this application and all attachments to it are true, accurate, and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief.
      • \n
    " }, { "type": "checkbox", "name": "acknowledgeAndCertify", "tag": "Optimum Checkbox", "title": "Do you agree to the following conditions above? ", "isRequired": true, "titleLocation": "hidden", "choices": [ "I agree" ] } ], "title": "Acknowledgements And Certifications", "category": "Acknowledgements and Benefit Rights" }, { "name": "Benefit Rights", "elements": [ { "type": "html", "name": "benefitRighstInfo", "html": "Attention:
    \nYou must read the following Benefit Rights Information. You have a legal responsibility to know and follow all rules and requirements of the UI program. If you have a question about your responsibilities or the requirements of receiving benefits, the UI customer service is here to help. Please contact 1-866-239-0843. \n

    \nUnemployment Insurance Handbook
    \nThe UI Handbook will answer most questions about your UI claim and help you avoid problems, delays, and improper payments. It explains your rights and responsibilities while claiming UI benefits. You are responsible for reading and knowing the contents of this handbook.\n

    \nAccess the Unemployment Insurance Handbook by clicking here: >\" target=\"_blank\">Unemployment Insurance Handbook\n

    \nMonetary Eligibility
    \nWe will send you a monetary record, if this is the first application you have filed in the past 12 months or more. Even though your Monetary Record may show UI benefit amounts, you must meet additional requirements to receive UI benefits.\n

    \nReview the record carefully to make sure the information is accurate. Contact us immediately if any information is incorrect. Wages you earned in other states, from military or federal employer will not be listed on your first monetary record because these wages must be requested. Once we receive your wages, we will send you a corrected monetary record.\n

    \nThe Monetary Record shows the following:\n
      \n
    • Start date of the claim
      • \n
    • Number of dependents claimed
      • \n
    • Work search requirements
      • \n
    • Weekly Benefit Amount (WBA)
      • \n
    • Maximum Benefit Amount (MBA)
      • \n
    • Employers you worked for during the base period and the last employer
      • \n
    • Wages you earned each quarter
      • \n
    \nRequesting a UI Benefit Payment
    \nTo request a UI benefit payment, you must file a weekly claim. You may submit your first weekly claim on <>\n

    \nYou will be reporting information for the week of <> through <>.\n

    \nYou can file your weekly claim online through your Claimant Portal.\n

    \nYou will be asked to report if you\n
      \n
    • Are totally or partially unemployed
      • \n
    • Are able and available for work
      • \n
    • Have refused any job offers or referrals
      • \n
    • Are actively looking for work (unless waived)
      • \n
    • Work search information (date applied for the job, position applied for, company contact information, etc.)
      • \n
    • Have or will receive earnings, vacation pay, holiday pay, severance pay
      • \n
    • Have or will receive pension and workers' compensation
      • \n
    " } ], "title": "Benefit Rights", "category": "Acknowledgements and Benefit Rights" } ] }
